snippet.title: Dreamers - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Get ready to go on an adventure in Dreamers, an upcoming game that will lead you on an emotional journey in a story about friendship, exploration, and personal growth. Watch the relaxing trailer for a peek at this upcoming adventure, exploration game as the narrator imagines a peaceful life for a loved one. In Dreamers, join the three characters in their adventure through a 3D world with secondary storylines and mini-games, vehicles to upgrade, puzzles to solve, and collaborative split-screen experiences.
